item.title: Blogs
item.description:
Here is a list of some Bolgs that I think useful for who want to learn about single cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) and related information and tools.

Field Title
Aging FIGHT AGING!
Brain development 自然感觉刺激对脑发育的影响
Brain development 青少年脑发育的个体差异性
Brain development 丰富环境对儿童大脑发育的影响
Mendelian randomization 浅谈孟德尔随机化法与经济学研究的渊源
Mendelian randomization 孟德尔随机化推断暴露因素与健康结局的因果关系
GWAS GWAS入门文章与书籍推荐
scRNA-seq Dictionary learning for integrative, multimodal, and scalable single-cell analysis (video)
scRNA-seq Seurat - Guided Clustering Tutorial
scRNA-seq awesome-deep-learning-single-cell-papers

item.title: Databases
item.description:
Here is a list of some Databases that I think useful for who want to learn about single cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) and related information and tools.

Field Database Description Related paper
Single-cell scRNASeqDB Human Single Cell Transcriptome Database
Single-cell Azimuth App for reference based single-cell analysis paper
Single-cell CancerSCEM Cancer Single-cell Expression Map paper (PMID: 34643725)
Single-cell Curated cancer cell atlas (3CA) Collected, annotated and analyzed cancer scRNA-seq datasets paper
GWAS GWAS Catalog The NHGRI-EBI Catalog of human genome-wide association studies
GWAS UK Biobank The world’s most important health research database
GWAS ieu_MR-base MR-base is a database and analytical platform for Mendelian randomization
GWAS ezQTL ezQTL is a web-based tool for integrative QTL (Quantitative Trait Loci) visualization and colocalization with GWAS data for individual loci to aid GWAS annotation.
GWAS GWAS Summary Statistics GWAS Summary Statistics for Brain Imaging Phenotypes paper
GWAS SSGAC Data Portal The NHGRI-EBI Catalog of human genome-wide association studies paper
Brain CHCP Chinese Human Connectome Project paper
Network EnhFFL A Database of Enhancer Mediated Feed-Forward Loops paper
Network CellNetdb A Database of Enhancer Mediated Feed-Forward Loops paper (PMID: 38347596)

item.title: Description
item.description:
This repository is used to record same papers with different categories, such as, bioinformatics methods (main) in Papers with method and biology stories in Papers with story of single-cell omics data.

Maintenance

This repository is builded and maintained by Mengxu(mengxu98@qq.com ). If you interested it, please add items as follow rules, and PR: You can choose one of the following ways:

  1. Refer the ‘README’ file and manually fill in the following information:

    • Add “| Journal | Date | Title | Code | Data | Citation |”;
    • For Journal and Title, please sort by A-Z;
    • For Date, please sort by published date;
    • For Code and Data, please reference: https://img.shields.io/;
    • For Citation, the data of Citation could obtain from: https://www.semanticscholar.org/ .

  2. Automatically fill in information using ’extract_paper_infor’ function:

    • Parameter: ‘url_paper’, need to provide a link to the paper from https://www.semanticscholar.org/;
    • Parameter: ‘code_language’, the main programming languages used in the paper;
    • Parameter: ‘url_code’, code storage address in the paper;
    • Parameter: ‘data_database’, database for storing data in the paper;
    • Parameter: ‘url_data’, data storage address in the paper.

    Note:

    • Using pip install -r requirements.txt to get all the dependencies
    • Please shut down the proxy service when using this script!
    • If you encounter any problems while using the script, please issue on GitHub.

item.title: Papers with method
item.description:
Journal Date Title Code Data Citation
Cell-cell communication
Nature Communications 2022 Knowledge-graph-based cell-cell communication inference for spatially resolved transcriptomic data with SpaTalk
Data integration
Genome Biology 2022 Evaluation of cell-cell interaction methods by integrating single-cell RNA sequencing data with spatial information
Nature Communications 2022 Elucidating tumor heterogeneity from spatially resolved transcriptomics data by multi-view graph collaborative learning
Gene regulatory network
Bioinformatics 2023 STGRNS: an interpretable transformer-based method for inferring gene regulatory networks from single-cell transcriptomic data
BioAge
Nature Medicine 2023 Heterogeneous aging across multiple organ systems and prediction of chronic disease and mortality (BioAge)
Nature Neuroscience 2019 Common brain disorders are associated with heritable patterns of apparent aging of the brain
Enrichment analysis
Nature Communications 2022 Multi-modal quantification of pathway activity with MAYA
Computational and Structural Biotechnology Journal 2021 UCell: Robust and scalable single-cell gene signature scoring
Nature Communications 2015 Biological interpretation of genome-wide association studies using predicted gene functions
Celltype Enrichment
Frontiers in Neuroscience 2016 Identification of Vulnerable Cell Types in Major Brain Disorders Using Single Cell Transcriptomes and Expression Weighted Cell Type Enrichment

A repository of Papers-With-Code

Tumor

Spatiotemporal transcriptomic

HAR
Nature Communications 2023 Genes associated with cognitive ability and HAR show overlapping expression patterns in human cortical neuron types
